reviews.review: This game is amazing, especially if you're like me and own a mac lol
有趣的关卡，剧情比较晦涩，不过本人不太关注剧情，解谜成功后很有成就感，值得一玩，游戏时间10小时左右吧。
игра хорошая но попадаются неадыкваты в кооперативе
классная игра на одиночку но кооп на умных людей а про моих друзей этого не скажешь потому что у меня нет друзей 10 порталов из 10
游戏不错，有点意思，需要巧用门
Игра классная прошёл её всю хотел поддержать разработчиков и купить но денег нету
basically, this game is awesome! story is good, has some boring parts but if you keep going its pretty good!
Portal 2 is quite possibly the greatest puzzle game of all time. GlaDOS is as charming as she is in the first game (and made way better) I know nothing I say hasn't been said before about this game.
Jogo sensacional, história incrível com grandes plots, ótimos puzzles, e sinceramente.... a melhor atuação de personagens que eu já vi.
Es un buen juego, bien hecho y exelente historia
Juegazo, mejor incluso que Portal. Al contrario que el anterior, dura bastante más. Ambos muy recomendables.

GENIAL SIMPLESMENTE GENIAL, NÃO TEM OUTRAS PALAVRAS
Historia incrível, simplesmente sensacional, e com uma DUBLAGEM DE TIRAR O FOLEGO. Uma obra de arte, incrível demais
THIS IS LEGIT THE MOST GOD LIKE GAME TO EVER EXIST WOULD TOTALLY RECOMMEND
Great no-pressure puzzle game. Great for beginners using mouse and keyboard. Good story. Funny characters. Good time. Community made puzzles are much better and challenging than the game.
Fun game. New puzzles and all kinds of stuff. Good story to go along.

Never has another game made me feel like a genius and a complete f***ing moron in the span of a few seconds. Story is amazing with great puzzles that make the player feel a sense of accomplishment upon completing, and plenty of user-made levels to keep bringing you back.
You must always be thinking with portals.

I'm going to keep this simple. Get it! It's a great game that simple and easy to pickup and understand and play. challenges the mind while being very easy to understand where you need to go and adds game mechanics through the story as you play. runs on just about anything with a dual core cpu and something that might be called graphics with a couple gigs of ram. well worth it, even 8 years after it came out. one of my favorites.
Valve at its finest, hopefully they do good with HL : Alex.
its a funny game and amazing when u play it in CO-OP
one of my favorite games of all time. Had it forever, starting on the xbox 360. 10/10
Un jeu amusent et qui demande de la réflexion

К цифре "2" рядом с наименованием хорошего продукта принято относится скептически, однако Portal 2 гораздо лучше Portal: вместо двух персонажей у нас теперь их целых восемь, и трое из них играбельные (роботы Пи-боди и Атлас, главная героиня). Доступен режим совместной игры. "Портал 2" получился намного лучше первой части.

tutto quello che era il primo, ma con una grafica migliorata, più lungo e con una modalità COOP, sia locale che online.

da far giocare anche chi non è avvezzo con i videgame
great game-play, a newer experience than all these similar games with different names these days
Incredible personality and style for a game about transporting blocks and lasers across a room, games without violence and still being as fun is quite the feat.

이젠 고전게임이지만 정말 짜임새있는 퍼즐게임이었던것 같습니다.
되도록이면 공략같은거 보지마시고 진행해 보세요. 충분히 해결 가능한 난이도 입니다.
I really enjoyed going through the story of the game i have to say it was really well made and the voice acting got laughing sometimes. Overall the game is a masterpiece.
Прошёл очередной шедевр от вальвы. Сюжет просто бомба, порадовало то,что он оказался длиннее чем в первой части. Ставлю твёрдую 10 только из-за картошки-гладос!
It is a simple puzzle game with great graphics and a decent story.
Très bon jeu. Les graphismes sont bon et le gameplay génial. Le solo et le multijoueur ont un bon level design.
If you like to shoot walls, this game is for you.

Les personnes qui ne feront pas ce jeu au cours de leur vie sont des gigas fdp.
INCROYABLE COMME JEU.
эта игра как для друзей так для расслабления  в одиночку ну при этом надо много думать
Je peux juste dire que c'est bien
I enjoyed the story and game machanics
What can I say, it's the best logical game I've ever played.

valve firmasının en güzel oyunlarından biride portal 2'dir neden derseniz oyun gelmiş geçmiş en güzel fiziğe sahip ve hikayesini güzel sergiliyor oyunu çok eskiden indirip oynamıştım ve nojtaşi olsun diye tekrar oynamaya karar verip oynadım oyun gerçekten güzeldi UZAY çok merak edici bir şey şimdi çift kişilik bir arkadaşımla bitircez

아들하고 코옵 모드 다 깼습니다.
